meaningMnemonic: The <radical>leader</radical> has a <radical>cloud</radical> that he uses to <kanji>transmit</kanji> all of the messages he needs to send to his people. The cloud floats above him and when he wants to tell people something he just whispers into the cloud and it transmits his message really, really loudly to all of them.
readingMnemonic: As the leader <kanji>transmit</kanji>s his latest series of messages to you and the others, you notice a pretty large <reading>den</reading>t (でん) in it. That dent is probably a clue to what this cloud is really made of.
